short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Divine Shop Extension makes it easier to buy games from Steam

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension adds a purchase button for apps at Steam that shows the price from Divine Shop and directs user to the app page at Divine Shop.
